item.description:
Set your worries aside.

Relax, unwind enjoy the atmosphere and mingle.

Sabur a great find nestled in Somerville.

Their brunch menu is from the Mediterranean ranging from Italy, Greece, South France, North Africa and beyond.

We will be seated in the lounge area. Where the decor and surroundings are exotic. The staff and the bartenders are very friendly.

Please be prompt.

Reservations are under Keith,

Parking is free on Sundays in Somerville.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, taxes and tip.

For more information about Sabur visit:

Sabur

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Sabur Brunch
